name: A Delightful Rosé Sangria
description: Learn more about making sangria here » This is perfect for a wedding shower or early afternoon occasion....
recipeIngredient: 2 liters seltzer water or club soda, chilled

recipeInstructions.text: In a large container, sprinkle the fruit (strawberries, raspberries and pineapple) with 1/4 cup of sugar.
Pour 1/4 cup Crème de Cassis over the fruit and allow to marinate for no less than an hour, but no more than 4 hours.
Add the rosé; and seltzer water or club soda. Taste and add more sugar if necessary.
Stir, chill, and add ice just before serving.
